author: Kitsap Sun, Chris Henry, Kitsap Sun
title: Should kids go on playdates? Are playgrounds safe? Here's what pediatricians are saying.
description: As parents look for ways to entertain kids while quarantining, here's a look at which activities are still safe.
content:
Reviewed editor-in-chief David Kender shares creative ways to keep your kids engaged while you're stuck at home.
USA TODAY
BREMERTON, Wash. Parents wondering if it's OK to take their kids to the playground as the world implements increasingly strict measure… [+7698 chars]
